mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ddbh AS "ddbh", a.je AS "je", a.lx AS "lx", a.state AS "state", a.issp AS "issp", a.spr AS "spr.id", su.name AS "spr.name", a.spsj AS "spsj", a.cHouse AS "cHouse.id", ch.name AS "cHouse.name", a.supplier_id AS "supplier.id", csu.name AS "supplier.name", a.store_id AS "store.id", cst.name AS "store.name", cst.mdtp AS "store.mdtp", a.rkckdate AS "rkckdate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", sut.name AS "createBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sjje AS "sjje", a.htje AS "htje"

LEFT JOIN c_house ch ON ch.id=a.cHouse LEFT JOIN c_supplier csu ON a.supplier_id=csu.id LEFT JOIN c_store cst ON a.store_id=cst.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id=a.spr LEFT JOIN sys_user sut ON sut.id=a.create_by
mapper.select:
SELECT o.* FROM( SELECT
FROM c_rkckddinfo a
WHERE a.ddbh LIKE concat('%',#{ddbh},'%')
) o LIMIT ${fybs},10

SELECT
FROM c_rkckddinfo a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
SELECT a.create_by AS "createBy.id", sut.name AS "createBy.name", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM c_rkckddinfo a LEFT JOIN sys_user sut ON sut.id=a.create_by GROUP BY a.create_by
SELECT a.store_id AS "store.id", cst.name AS "store.name", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM c_rkckddinfo a LEFT JOIN c_store cst ON cst.id=a.store_id GROUP BY a.store_id

SELECT
FROM c_rkckddinfo a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.lx = 1 AND FIND_IN_SET(a.state,#{state}) AND a.issp= 0
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT
FROM c_rkckddinfo a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.lx = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(a.state,#{state}) AND a.issp= 0
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_rkckddinfo( id, ddbh, je, lx, state, issp, spr, spsj, cHouse, supplier_id, store_id, rkckdate, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag, sjje, htje ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ddbh}, #{je}, #{lx}, #{state}, #{issp}, #{spr.id}, #{spsj}, #{cHouse.id}, #{supplier.id}, #{store.id}, #{rkckdate}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sjje}, #{htje} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_rkckddinfo SET ddbh = #{ddbh}, je = #{je}, lx = #{lx}, state = #{state}, issp = #{issp}, spr = #{spr.id}, spsj = #{spsj}, cHouse = #{cHouse.id}, supplier_id = #{supplier.id}, store_id = #{store.id}, rkckdate = #{rkckdate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks}, sjje=#{sjje}, htje=#{htje} WHERE id = #{id}
